attributes.action: Force TFL to extend the Central Line (London Underground) to Southall station and improve the condition of the station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, 1 million people have to use National rail or local bus services from Southall to join the London Underground network. This wastes peoples time and costs them money in having to interchange from BR to LU. 

The station is also in a state of disrepair. London Assembly Member Murad Qureshi said it was one of the worst stations in London.
